newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Southern Co raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Southern Co raised to buy.

text.p: Furman Selz said Monday it raised its rating on shares of Southern Co to buy from hold and added the stock to its recommended list.
-- Firm said in a research note the electric utility company had an above-average dividend yield and an average multiple relative to its peers.

-- But Furman lowered its 1997 earnings estimate on the stock to $1.68 per share from $1.80 and its 1998 estimate to $1.76 per share from $1.89, saying earnings could be partly depressed by accelerating depreciation of its nuclear plants.
-- "Southern could be one of the winners in a deregulated environment because of its fast-growing non-regulated business, justifying a much higher price-to-earnings ratio," Furman said.
